messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Busy Toddler - Nancy
messages.msgSnippet: [She rarely sleeps during the day, is on a mission to conquer the world, NEEDS to hold the cat or kitten at all times, sometimes by the neck, must play in
messages.messageBody:
[She rarely sleeps during the day, is on a mission to
conquer the world, NEEDS to hold the cat or kitten at
all times, sometimes by the neck, must play in water
at all times, Must nurse on a stack of 3 particular
pillows, holding 2 dolls, and must move more quickly
the more tired she is.]

Nancy,

You just described my DD who just turned 2! LOL Your
description made me laugh at the antics of your little
angel, and enabled me to change how I look at/react to
my lil' cutie. Thanks for the head check! ;)

=====
~Tracy~
Mama to Aydn and Fiona
